DOC.brief_summary: Pilot trial open-label chondroitin sulfate 400 mg TID adult patient mild moderate Crohn 's disease . Primary endpoint evidence bilogic effect assess serum tissue cytokine analysis . Secondary endpoint evidence clinical effect , endoscopic healing , histologic improvment . Trial duration 8 week .
